an5.50:3.4: vuddho ceva → vuḍḍho ceva (sya-all); buddho ceva (mr) | arahā ca → arahā cā’ti (?)
an5.50:7.1: bhadraṃ yānaṃ → bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni (sya-all, km); bhaddaṃ yānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed); bhadraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ (mr) | mahaccā → mahacca (bahūsu)
an5.50:18.4: Taggha, bhante, sokasallaharaṇo → taggha bhante sokasallaharaṇo (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
